#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
#include<stdio.h>
void base(int a,int b)
{
        if(a<=0) return ;
        else base ( a/b,b);
        printf("%d",a%b);
        return ;        
}
int main(){
        int t,a,b;
        cin>>t;
        while(t--){
                cin>>a>>b;
                if(a==0) cout<<"0";
                else
                base(a,b);
                cout<<endl;
        }
        return 0;
}
